briefdescription.para: Launched from 'DayZGame.DeferredInit' to make earlier access, use, and updates impossible (downside of a non-static system)

briefdescription.para: deprecated use, StaminaHandler uses SyncJunctures now
called from PlayerBase - syncs stamina values on server with client AND sets the value to match on server and client both (m_StaminaSynced guarantees identical values)
Method to sync more info for stamina manager. Template parameter means it is very extendable for further use.
Order of read parameters must match the order of writing above.
Calulates stamina regain bonus coef based on current stamina cap and level.

inbodydescription.para: sets exhaustion look of player based on stamina level

briefdescription.para: check if the stamina is completely depleted

inbodydescription.para: in case of complete depletion - start a cooldown timer before the regeneration cycle start

briefdescription.para: set cooldown timer between each consume of stamina
